abstract: With stock making up a larger portion of compensation at many firms, investment bankers and traders stand to benefit financially from a longer-term market recovery, says Reuters Breakingviews.
snippet: With stock making up a larger portion of compensation at many firms, investment bankers and traders stand to benefit financially from a longer-term market recovery, says Reuters Breakingviews.

abstract: Nomura Holdings, Goldman Sachs Group and Bank of America are moving investment bankers who specialize in advising financial-services companies to Asia as banks and insurers sell record amounts of shares.
snippet: Nomura Holdings, Goldman Sachs Group and Bank of America are moving investment bankers who specialize in advising financial-services companies to Asia as banks and insurers sell record amounts of shares.
lead_paragraph: Nomura Holdings, Goldman Sachs and Bank of America are moving investment bankers who specialize in advising financial-services companies to Asia as banks and insurers sell record amounts of shares, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Finance Bankers Getting Relocated to Asia
